Explore the flavors of Carnault

Underlining the natural product design are flavors which were developed to be reminiscent of natural sceneries, like for example a cold winter day in the alps with clouds moving by or a misty rainforest in the morning.

Explore the flavors of Carnault

Learn more
+
Underlining the natural product design are flavors which were developed to be reminiscent of natural sceneries, like for example a cold winter day in the alps with clouds moving by or a misty rainforest in the morning. Additionally, we are working with e.g. gingerol to cause a slight and harmless scratching in the throat when inhaling to mimic the feel of tobacco smoke. This way our flavors can reliably offer the cigarette moment we love.
